attributes.action: Re-instate the devonwide bus pass scheme to Torbay. enabling elderly and disabled passengers to travel freely across devon for free again.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Re-instate the devonwide bus pass scheme to Torbay. enabling elderly and disabled passengers to travel freely across devon for free again.

this was recently taken away because the council could not afford it. yet 3 or 4 miles away in Totnes they continue with the Devonwide scheme. if you live in Torbay you now can only go to Torquay or Paignton. A Fare iof£1 is charged for plymouth or exeter destinations. which for many elderly people they cannot afford.
